list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an electromagnetic wave with a wavelength in the range 0.001–0.3 m, shorter than that of a normal radio wave but longer than those of infrared radiation. Microwaves are used in radar, in communications, and for heating in microwave ovens and in various industrial processes.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he microwaved some steak out of the freezer
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta vi sóng một ít bít tết ra khỏi tủ đông
